headline: Is Conagra Brands (CAG) Offering An Opportunity After Recent Share Price Rebound?
summary: If you are wondering whether Conagra Brands' current share price offers good value or just a value trap risk, you will want to see how its fundamentals line up against that price. The stock recently closed at US$18.89, with returns of 11.4% over 30 days and 9.2% year to date, set against longer term moves of 15.0% decline over 1 year and 38.7% decline over 3 years. Recent coverage around Conagra Brands has focused on its position as a packaged foods player and how investors are weighing...

headline: A Look At Conagra (CAG) Valuation As Shares Trade Near Consensus Targets
summary: Conagra Brands (CAG) is on investors’ radar after recent trading left the stock around $18.89, with returns over the past month and past 3 months contrasting with its weaker one year performance. See our latest analysis for Conagra Brands. That latest move to around $18.89 comes after an 11.38% 1 month share price return and 8.56% 3 month share price return. The 1 year total shareholder return of 15.02% and 3 year total shareholder return of 38.71% both remain weak, suggesting recent momentum...
